## imGuiInjectEvent() function

Injects a browser event into the GUI system

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function imGuiInjectEvent(ev: Event, type?: string): boolean;
```

string

_(Optional)_ Event type, default to ev.type if not specified.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

A boolean value indices if the event was processed by GUI system
